Roselle Parking Lot Enhancement Work Beginning Friday, June 20 through Sunday, June 22
On Friday, June 20 through Sunday, June 22, enhancement work will take place in the Roselle parking lot.  We recommend allowing additional travel time during this construction.

The Van Buren Street station elevator is out of service. Customers can use South Water or McCormick Place as alternate boarding stations.

RID #428 Delayed
RID train #428, scheduled to arrive LaSalle Street Station at 4:56 PM, is operating 20 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to earlier freight train interference.

RID #703 Delayed Departure

RID train #703, scheduled to depart LaSalle Street Station at 4:30 PM, will be delayed in departure due to freight train interference . The duration of this delay is unknown. Metra will provide updates as information becomes available.

HC Train #915 - On The Move

HC train #915, scheduled to arrive Joliet at 4:56 PM, is on the move and may be operating 45 to 50 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.

RI LaSalle Street Station Elevator Is Temporary Out Of Service

The LaSalle Street Station elevator is temporarily out of service. Recommended alternative accessible location is CTA elevator, located at LaSalle St. Stations' west exit. Metra will provide updated information once service has been restored

SWS Train #815
SWS train #815, scheduled to arrive Manhattan at 5:39 PM, is on the move and may be operating 10 to 15 minutes behind schedule.

Metra Alert ME - 87th street/Woodruff Station Closure Beginning December 16 - Station Rebuild Project

The 87th street/Woodruff station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, December 16. During this time passengers can use 83rd and 91st street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, the station will have an enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrance, lobby with an elevator, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage. The station is expected to reopen in late 2025. For more information visit metra.com.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 79th Street/Chatham Station
The 79th Street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric may not be fully ADA accessible Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME -  103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St,/Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-N - Fox Lake Station Platform Closure

Attention Fox Lake Station passengers: The north end of the Fox Lake platform and a section of the north parking lot will be closed until further notice for construction at the depot. Trains will load and unload from the south end of the platform.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-N -  Golf rehabilitation project will start on Monday April 14, 2025

Beginning Monday, April 14, the Golf station south half of Platforms 1 and 2 will be out of service including the pedestrian crosswalk and ADA ramp for rehabilitation for approximately 6 weeks. Recommended alternative accessible locations are Glenview and Morton Grove.  After completion of the south half, the north half of Platforms 1and 2 will be out of service for approximately 6 weeks to complete the rehabilitation project. Metra will update this station with additional information as it becomes available. We apologize for any inconvenience.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-NW - Beginning June 2, 2025, the Pingree Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station construction.

Beginning June 2,2025, the Pingree Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station construction. ADA access will resume late 2025. Passengers requiring full accessibility should use Crystal Lake station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is fully restored.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert SWS - Oak Lawn Platform Rehabilitation

Beginning Saturday, May 24, platform rehabilitation at Oak Lawn Station will begin. Phase one will result in the closure of the west half of platform 1, the inbound platform. After phase one is completed, phase two will begin with the closure of the east half of platform 1. Please allow additional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-N - Temporary Stairway Closure - Evanston Central Street Station

Beginning Tuesday, June 17 through Friday, June 20, the stairway located on the Northeast corner of Green Bay Road & Lincoln Street will be temporarily closed due to roadway construction. Customers can access the station platform via the stairway on Green Bay Road & Central Street. Please allow additional travel time during this construction.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Millennium Station Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
